mapper.select: select no,CAST(aes_decrypt(UNHEX(name),'sowonkey') as char) as name,aes_decrypt(UNHEX(id),'sowonkey') as id,role from user where id=HEX(aes_encrypt(#{id},'sowonkey')) and password=sha2(#{password},512)
select no,name,email,password,gender,join_date,role from user where id = HEX(aes_encrypt(#{value},'sowonkey'))
select name,email,password,gender,join_date from user where no = #{value}
